entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:14 p.m. CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -3.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 2:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: NNW 40 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
